name: Mega token
description:
Control Radius, Padding & Shadows from a single place.


This concept utilises Figma's native features to control these 3 Design tokens without plugins.


Enhance your theming process by adopting this approach when building your component library.


Now every time a client want's to update certain values, change them in the Mega token.


Watch your changes cascade to everything, everywhere.


No plugins required.
